nodes.text: Burnin Konn was a planet that was located in the Burnin Konn system within Anoat sector, situated in the midst of the Ivax Nebula. One of the sector's four Mining Worlds, Burnin Konn was strip-mined for ore including dolovite and kammris; as a result of this, the native vegetation was completely destroyed. At the time of the Galactic Civil War, the planet was controlled by Figg business interests.
